header_text: You apply for a new job in a different state, but your entire family lives in the state you're currently in. You think about how your family will react when you tell them your decision and they may not like the idea of you leaving. As you imagine telling them, you feel excited.

elements.Text: Are you worried about telling your family that you want to work and live in a different state?

elements.name: You apply for a new job in a different state, but your entire family lives in the state you're currently in.
